definition: the act of concealing the existence of something by obstructing the view of it
details:
noun
- the act of concealing the existence of something by obstructing the view of it
= synonyms: screening
- scenery used to block the audience's view of parts of the stage that should not be seen
= synonyms: masking piece
- the blocking of one sensation resulting from the presence of another sensation
= example: the blocking of one sensation resulting from the presence of another sensation
